entry.title: Nike Launches .Swoosh Web3 Platform, With Polygon NFTs Due in 2023
entry.summary: After CryptoKicks comes .Swoosh, a destination for virtual apparel and other NFT-based products, with the first drop due in January.

entry.title: Adidas' Bored Ape NFT Makes Appearance With Messi, Benzema in New World Cup Trailer
entry.summary: Adidas’ own Indigo Herz Bored Ape NFT joins Messi and Benzema in a teaser trailer for Qatar's upcoming FIFA World Cup.

entry.title: Crypto.com CEO Says 'Business as Usual' After Revelations of 'Accidental' $400M Transfer
entry.summary: Crypto.com CEO Kris Marszalek sought to soothe investor woes after an errant $400 million transfer shook users over the weekend.

entry.title: Binance to Be 'Guinea Pig' for Vitalik Buterin's Proof-of-Reserves Protocol: CZ
entry.summary: The CEO of Binance revealed plans to implement a new Proof-of-Reserves protocol developed by Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin.

entry.title: Visa Pulls Plug on FTX Partnership, Will Wind Down Debit Cards: Report
entry.summary: Payments giant Visa is reportedly shuttering its partnership with FTX following the latter’s bankruptcy filing last week.

entry.title: DeFi Weekly Exchange Volume Hits $32 Billion Amid FTX Collapse
entry.summary: When Binance announced it would bail out FTX, daily trading volumes mushroomed on decentralized exchanges like Uniswap.

entry.title: Binance to Remove Trading Pairs for FTX Token—Except With Stablecoin BUSD
entry.summary: Alongside shuttering FTT trading pairs with Bitcoin and Ethereum, Binance is also closing off the ability to short FTX’s token.

entry.title: Congressman Brad Sherman Takes Aim at ‘Billionaire Crypto Bros’ for Slowing Regulation
entry.summary: The California-based accountant turned politician Brad Sherman has intensified his crypto criticism amid the recent market turmoil.

entry.title: Trust Wallet Token Soars 47% as Binance CEO Shills Self-Custody Solution
entry.summary: Amid FTX Exchange’s collapse, the token powering self-custody crypto wallet Trust Wallet has soared as users flee exchanges.

entry.title: Binance CEO Announces 'Industry Recovery Fund' Amid FTX Exchange Collapse
entry.summary: The world's largest crypto exchange Binance is forming an "industry recovery fund" to help projects overcome possible liquidity crises.

entry.title: Non-Custodial vs Custodial Wallets: What's the Difference?
entry.summary: Custodial wallets are considered a low-entry barrier for those new to the crypto space since they are easy to use and can be accessed from any device with an internet connection. However, security is a major concern.

entry.title: FTX Crisis Is the Hottest Topic at the Biggest Bitcoin Conference in Latin America
entry.summary: The collapse of Sam Bankman-Fried’s empire was the talk of the town at this year’s LaBitConf in Buenos Aires.

entry.title: Chorus of Lawmakers Collectively Call for Crypto Controls in FTX Fallout
entry.summary: Lawmakers sounded off on the need for better investor protections after a chaotic week.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: FTX’s Collapse as It Happened, in Tweets
entry.summary: The entire market crashed this week as one of the industry’s biggest players watched their empire totally evaporate in five days flat.

entry.title: Bahamas Police Are Investigating Potential 'Criminal Misconduct' by FTX
entry.summary: The Royal Bahamas Police Force is "working closely with the Bahamas Securities Commission to investigate if any criminal misconduct occurred."

entry.title: Crypto.com Accidentally Sent $400M in Ethereum to Wrong Address, CEO Calls Concerns ‘FUD’
entry.summary: Crypto.com’s $400 million mishap leaves its token down 50% and raises doubts over the exchange’s transparency following FTX’s collapse.

entry.title: What Makes a Shitcoin 'Shit'? Major Figures in Crypto Disagree
entry.summary: If you're not sure what differentiates a "shitcoin" from an altcoin, don't worry: some of the industry's biggest names at LaBitConf aren't either.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: FTX Goes Broke, Bitcoin Falls to Two-Year Low
entry.summary: The crypto industry bore witness to one of the most sudden and devastating contractions of wealth in financial history.

entry.title: Hundreds of Millions of Dollars Drained From FTX Overnight in 'Unauthorized' Transfers
entry.summary: Several wallets belonging to FTX were rapidly drained before midnight. An FTX Telegram admin called it a hack and warned users not to visit the site.

entry.title: Elon Musk: Sam Bankman-Fried 'Set Off My BS Detector' When He Approached About Twitter Investment
entry.summary: When SBF approached Musk about investing in his Twitter bid, Musk asked his banker Michael Grimes, "Does Sam actually have $3B liquid?"

entry.title: 'Like a 1930s Dictator': Vitalik Buterin Lays Into Sam Bankman-Fried and FTX
entry.summary: FTX's ignominious collapse was inevitable, Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin said at LaBitConf Friday.

entry.title: Crypto.com Holds 20% of Its Reserves in Meme Token SHIB
entry.summary: Amid questions over holdings, Crypto.com shares its data—and a major meme token makes up a big chunk of its reserves.

entry.title: FTX Spent Hundreds of Millions of Dollars on Sports Marketing on Road to Bankruptcy
entry.summary: FTX signed sports deals worth $375 million—and that's just the deals with publicly reported price tags. Now it has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy.

entry.title: From $26 Billion to Nothing: The Rise and Fall of SBF and FTX
entry.summary: Sam Bankman-Fried’s net worth evaporated this week alongside his businesses—and apparently billions’ worth of customer assets.

entry.title: Ontario Teachers Sunk $95M in FTX—Pension Fund Says Collapse Will Have 'Limited Impact'
entry.summary: If a Canadian pension fund investing in a crypto firm that’s gone bankrupt sounds familiar, that’s because it happened with Celsius Network.

entry.title: Amy Wu Resigns From FTX Ventures as SBF's Crypto Empire Unravels
entry.summary: A former partner at Lightspeed Ventures, Wu joined the investment arm of FTX in January, funding several crypto startups.

entry.title: Mercedes F1 Team Suspends FTX Deal Amid Company's Collapse
entry.summary: One of FTX’s many sports world partners has pulled back as the exchange files for bankruptcy protection.

entry.title: How to Get Money Out of FTX (But Only If You’re Filthy Rich)
entry.summary: A mysterious wash-trading arbitrageur has, it appears, found a cunning way to retrieve his or her frozen millions from the rubble of FTX.

entry.title: Disgraced FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried Says He’s Really Sorry—Again
entry.summary: Bankman-Fried said he is still "piecing together all of the details" of how he lost billions of dollars of users’ funds.

entry.title: FTX Files Chapter 11 Bankruptcy, SBF Steps Down as CEO
entry.summary: After a dramatic week, crypto exchange FTX has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy and its CEO Sam Bankman-Fried has resigned.

entry.title: SkyBridge's Scaramucci to SBF: 'Tell the Truth'
entry.summary: Along with urging the FTX chief to “tell the truth,” Scaramucci said his firm is working to buy back the exchange’s 30% stake in Skybridge.

entry.title: FTX Crisis an 'Opportunity' for US to Clarify Crypto Regulations: Coinbase CEO
entry.summary: The Coinbase CEO said that if the U.S. can catch up on regulating crypto, customers won’t be driven towards offshore exchanges.

entry.title: FTX Foundation Shutters Effective Altruism Fund as Key Execs Resign
entry.summary: The ambitious philanthropic project is set to wind down its operations following the near collapse of its parent and beneficiary FTX.

entry.title: California Announces Investigation Into ‘Apparent Failure” of Crypto Exchange FTX
entry.summary: California's finance regulator issued a consumer alert, announcing an investigation into FTX and urging affected clients to contact the DFPI.

entry.title: Ethereum, Dogecoin, and Polygon Post Fresh Gains as Crypto Rebounds
entry.summary: Investors had a brief reprieve from the deepening FTX crisis thanks to limited withdrawals and rosier inflation numbers.

entry.title: What You Need to Know About Exchange Tokens After FTX's FTT Meltdown
entry.summary: Exchange tokens are the backbone of many top exchanges, but how much risk is involved?

entry.title: BlockFi Pausing Withdrawals in Wake of FTX, Alameda Collapse
entry.summary: Also, California state regulators open an investigation and warn consumers of “volatile crypto assets.”

entry.title: Bahamas Freezes FTX Assets, Calls for Liquidator
entry.summary: The Securities Commission of the Bahamas, to which FTX relocated last year, issued the order.

entry.title: After Rattling Confidence in FTX, Binance Still Holds 5% of FTT Supply
entry.summary: Binance had originally received FTT tokens as part of its divestment from Sam Bankman-Fried’s exchange last year. But it’s only been able to sell off a small amount.

entry.title: Coinbase Lays Off Over 60 Employees Amid Crypto Market Turmoil
entry.summary: The crypto exchange continues to reduce its headcount in the protracted bear market.

entry.title: How Stepn Plans to Keep Running Through the Bear Market
entry.summary: Stepn COO Shiti Manghani speaks to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Solana Breakpoint in Lisbon to discuss how the move-to-earn app is weathering the bear market, its partnership with sportswear manufacturer Asics, and creator royalties on NFT marketplaces.

entry.title: Brave CEO Brendan Eich: Web3 Isn't Taking Privacy Seriously Enough
entry.summary: Brave founder and CEO Brendan Eich joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Web Summit 2022 to discuss how the crypto-powered browser is weathering the bear market—and why Web3 needs to get serious about privacy.

entry.title: The View from Rug Radio: Farokh Speaks at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: Farokh, founder of the DAO-governed NFT media brand Rug Radio, speaks to Mike Kriak of ConsenSys Mesh at Camp Decrypt: Napa. He talked about Rug Radio's origins, tokenization, sponsorship money during the bear market, and why it's called Rug Radio.

entry.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi
entry.summary: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: In the Alien Worlds Metaverse Game, DAOs Are Game Pieces
entry.summary: Stacy Neale of Dacoco, producer of Alien Worlds, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson at NFT Expoverse 2022 how Alien Worlds has a "DAO ecosystem" inside its game, and says it's "more than a game, more than DAOs, more than a metaverse."

entry.title: gm: Meet the Bored Apes
entry.summary: Bored Ape Yacht Club co-founders Wylie Aronow ("Gordon Goner") and Greg Solano ("Garga") joined Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin on the gm podcast to talk about BAYC parent company Yuga Labs and its size and influence in the space, Ape haters, NFT haters, the SEC investigating Yuga, Buzzfeed "doxxing" Aronow and Solano earlier this year, their vision for the Otherside metaverse realm, and much more. Watch Episode 21 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
